ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Cooks’ Ingredients soffritto mix
300g Waitrose lean minced free range British pork
395g can essential Waitrose mixed beans in spicy tomato sauce
1-2 tbsp Waitrose Cooks' Ingredients chipotle paste
½ essential Waitrose Iceberg lettuce, finely shredded

instructions.step: Cook’s tip: Adding a spoonful or two of chipotle paste is a great way to add a rich, smoky flavour to chilli and other Mexican-style dishes.
